A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I would like to sue Disney for false advertising. This was sold as a SEQUEL to Force Awakens but it disregarded even single question that film raised. Who was Snoke? Who were the Knights of Ren? Where did the First Order come from? How/when/where did Snoke meet Kylo and seduce him to the darkside? How did dumb orange Katana get Luke's lightsaber\, etc.

Those orphan sIaves at the end? That felt like a complete out of the blue conclusion to some other film. It did nothing to set up the next film.

How can this be called a TRILOGY if one film doesn't follow the next but are only loosely connected? So dumb.

When I see other reviews here and look at the scores they're giving\, I don't understand how RotTom can collate it to 49%.  Thats far too high.
